participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I've kept my college debt a secret from my parents. My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children. I work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager. School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic. I like to draw other people. I married Miss USA. It takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning. Both my parents were teachers.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going pretty great! I just got married!
Oh wow! Congrats!
Thanks! What about you, what's your day been like?
I've been working over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager, but school is going well.
Oh wow, that's a lot of hours! What do you like about your job?
I like the people I work with, and I enjoy the fast pace.
That's great! I work as a bartender, and I also enjoy the fast pace.
What's your favorite part of your job?
I like getting to meet new people and make them feel welcome.
That's a great quality to have! I'm sure your customers appreciate it.
Thanks!
What's your favorite color?
I like bright colors and patterns. They make me feel more confident and energetic.
That's a good choice! I like bright colors too.
I know you do! You always wear such interesting outfits.
Thanks! I like to express myself through my clothes.
I can tell! You always look great.
Thanks! You're so sweet.
You're welcome!
